extendedInfo.description: With the Hope For The Heart app for Android, you can easily listen to recent broadcasts from June Hunt on our daily 30 minute program, Hope For The Heart, or our 2-hour call-in counseling program, Hope In The Night. You can also see live streams from Juneâs Facebook and Twitter accounts, as well as watch engaging videos from Hope For The Heart.A ministry of June Hunt, Hope For The Heart is a worldwide ministry with a two-fold mission: Providing Bible-based counsel to renew minds, heal hearts, and bring hope to the hurting, while empowering Christians to disciple others -- Providingâ¦ Godâs Truth for Todayâs Problems.Our radio programs talk about lifeâs daily struggles and what the Bible says about 100 topics in our Biblical Counseling Keys. Our Biblical Counseling Keys are designed in a simple, easy-to-read, outline format to help you break down spiritual barriers on your way to freedom in Christ. This set of Keys presents God's heart on this topic and reveals ways you can walk in spiritual victory. Allow God's Word and His wisdom to help you and to help you help others.

reviews.comment: This app is a blessing to me daily!
